name: Pig man
description:
Here's another LoRA to address the NTR / monster content requests. Some say men are pig, and in this case they're right! This LoRA was trained to replace males with monster pig men.

How to use:

  • weight 1.0 (more or less depending on taste)

  • the CFG scale can have a strong effect on composition

  • no individual trigger word, but you can better activate it with ugly man. Also, you can use multiple boys. The following tags can increase or modify the effect: horror \(theme\),monster, orc, troll, etc. You can be creative.

  • the examples in the gallery are the easiest to prompt, and other aspect ratios and poses may be harder.

  • best results with 512x768 and with hires fix

Additional info

I make these models for fun and for the challenge and release them for free for everyone to enjoy, for non-commercial use (see license). The one thing I ask of you is to provide rating and feedback! That helps me understand where I can improve and helps me stay motivated to produce more content!

I accept suggestions or requests here or on Civitai discord server.

You can also check my more polished images and upcoming models on my pixiv profile.

meta.prompt:
<lora:pig_man_v0.2:1> 
1girl, elf, blonde hair, 
ugly man, multiple boys, swamp, dirty, fat man,, masterpiece, best quality, highly detailed

<lora:pig_man_v0.2:1> 
1girl, elf, blonde hair, mature female, fleeing, screaming, 
1boy, ugly man, pigman, horror \(theme\),, masterpiece, best quality, highly detailed
